page.title: 0405350178: Urban Change
page.content: This is a changing area. It consists largely of residential areas and light industrial sites. However, there are, and have been for some time, plans afoot to make changes but as the plans themselves are constantly being changed nobody knows what will be done, nor when. There is a great shortage of amenities and services, particularly for children and young people. The residential areas consist largely of blocks of flats which have replaced the old terraces but not the old community spirit. People in the area are surrounded by a stark, dirty, deprived and desolate landscape.
